ETYMOLOGY: From Late Latin extensiō (act of stretching out), from extendere (to stretch out, spread out), from Latin ex- ('out') + tendere ('to stretch').

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The act or process of extending, stretching out, or enlarging something; the state of being stretched out.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 延伸；扩大；扩充（的行为或过程）；伸展状态
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The extension of the railway line will connect remote villages.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这条铁路线的延伸将连接偏远村庄。

MEANINGS.PATTERN: an extension to [sth] | an extension of [sth]
MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An additional part or continuation of something, especially a building, a telephone line, or a program.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 扩大部分；附属部分；分机；分部
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The museum built a new extension to house its modern art collection.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 博物馆新建了一个扩建部分，用于收藏其现代艺术品。

MEANINGS.PATTERN: an extension for [sth] | an extension of time
MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A grant of additional time; a permitted delay for payment, completion, or submission.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The student requested an extension for her essay deadline.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这名学生申请了论文截止日期的延期。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: One of a number of telephones connected to a main line, typically in an office or large building; also, the specific number used to call it directly.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please dial extension 456 to reach the human resources department.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请拨分机456联系人力资源部。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A suffix to a computer filename, typically indicating the file's type (.txt, .pdf, .jpg). Or, a small software program that adds functionality to a web browser.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: （文件）扩展名；（浏览器）扩展程序
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The document has a .docx extension, indicating it's a Microsoft Word file.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 该文档具有.docx扩展名，表明它是Microsoft Word文件。

REGISTER: General (used across everyday, academic, professional, and technical contexts).
